solution_line_template: The total distance of the trip is {distance_slc_lv} + {distance_lv_la} = <<{distance_slc_lv}+{distance_lv_la}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles.
To make the trip Andy must drive {total_distance} miles / {target_hours} hours = <<{total_distance}/{target_hours}={average_speed}>>{average_speed} miles per hour.
